title: Add mailto email button to Contact section

requirements.text: In the Contact section, add a prominent 'Email Me' button or link that opens the visitor's default email client pre-addressed to pranaavsanjith@gmail.com using a mailto: link. The button should be styled consistently with the existing midnight-violet dark theme and placed visibly within the contact area alongside the existing form and social links.

quotes: create a way they can message me by gmail

acceptanceCriteria: An 'Email Me' button or link is visible in the Contact section
Clicking the button opens the user's default email client with the To field pre-filled as pranaavsanjith@gmail.com
The button uses a mailto:pranaavsanjith@gmail.com href
The button styling is consistent with the existing dark midnight-violet theme (colors, typography, border radius)
The button is accessible and works on both desktop and mobile

constraints: Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths
Do not add any external email service integrations (no Formspree, SendGrid, etc.)
Use only a mailto: link â€” no backend changes required
nonGoals: Integrating a third-party form service like Formspree
Sending emails programmatically from the backend
Modifying the existing contact form submission flow
Changing any other section of the portfolio
